mapper.sql: u.u_name = #{username}, u.tid=#{userType}, u.phone=#{phone}, u.email=#{email}, u.nickname=#{nickname}, u.signature=#{signature}, u.head_img=#{userHeadImg}, u.u_level=#{uLevel}, u.oid=#{userInfoOpenDegree}, u.face_img=#{faceImg}, u.fans_num=#{fansNum}, u.blacklist_uid=#{blacklistUid}, u.experience=#{experience}, u.health_degree=#{healthDegree}, u.honor_degree=#{honorDegree}, u.create_time=#{userCreateTime}, u.update_time=#{userUpdateTime}, u.status=#{userStatus},
